name: crafting-efficiency-2
title: Crafting Efficiency
author: Grfionice99
description: Adds technologies to increase yield of recipes. Auto-updates entities on all surfaces with the updated recipes when research completes. Now with more-efficient recipes for items, mega-base production levels can be achieved in smaller footprints. NOTE: IT'S A REWRITE OF https://mods.factorio.com/mod/crafting-efficiency
